bill.title: Franchise agreements; regulate between outdoor sport equipment dealers, manufacturers and distributors.
bill.description: An Act To Regulate Franchise Agreements Between Outdoor Sport Equipment Dealers, Manufacturers And Distributors; To Define Certain Terms Used In The Act; To Require A Dealership Agreement And Compliance; To Prescribe The Contents Of A Dealership Agreement; To Prohibit Certain Conduct With Regard To The Sale, Transfer, Exchange Of Dealership; To Regulate The Cancellation And Alteration Of Dealerships; To Require The Repurchase Of Inventory If Dealer Agreement Is Terminated Without Good Cause; To Regulate Warranty Claims Submitted By A Dealer To An Outdoor Sport Equipment Manufacturer; To Provide Remedies For Violations Of The Act; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Judiciary A;Ways and Means
